select Aid, ShopId, UserId, Title, Price, Number, Content, Status, ShareCount, PlusCount, IsRecommend, DeadLine, BeginDate, Created, Updated from m_appointment

select Aid, ShopId, UserId, Title, Price, Number, Content, STATUS, IF(ShareCount IS NULL,0,ShareCount)as ShareCount, IF(PlusCount IS NULL,0,PlusCount)as PlusCount, DeadLine, BeginDate, Created, Updated from m_appointment
Status = 1
and UserId = #{userId}
and UserId in (select UserId from m_user where sex = #{sex})
and Aid in(select Aid from m_appointment_player WHERE `Status` = 2)
and Aid NOT IN(select Aid from m_appointment_player WHERE `Status` = 2)
and IsRecommend = #{isRecommend}
order by Created desc

SELECT DISTINCT a.Aid, a.ShopId, a.UserId,a.Title,a.Price, a.Number, a.Content, a.Status, IF(a.ShareCount IS NULL,0,a.ShareCount)AS ShareCount, IF(a.PlusCount IS NULL,0,a.PlusCount)AS PlusCount, a.DeadLine,a.BeginDate, a.Created, a.Updated FROM m_appointment a LEFT JOIN m_appointment_comment b ON a.`Aid`=b.`Aid`
a.Status = 1 AND a.`UserId` != #{userId} AND (b.UserId = #{userId} OR b.`Acid` IN(SELECT CommentId FROM m_appointment_comment_reply WHERE UserId = #{userId}))
and a.Aid in(select Aid from m_appointment_player WHERE `Status` = 2 and Joiner = #{userId})
and a.Aid NOT IN(select Aid from m_appointment_player WHERE `Status` = 2 and Joiner = #{userId})
ORDER BY a.Created DESC
